item.title: Portal ( delta)

item.description:
@n0_limit_k0 wrote:

hey guyz im working on a portal this is the pic

when i click on the portal and click on any location the portal wont take me any wherE:( means i cannot click it.

here is the commands i added in java.client

if (objectID == 7315)
	{

				teleEffect = 5;
				sendQuest("Where would you like to go?", 2470);
				sendQuest("East dragon? [wild]", 2471);
				sendQuest("God War [Bandos]", 2472);
				sendQuest("KBD (Danger) [wild]", 2473);
				sendFrame164(2469);
	}

and here is what i added in mostcliking

NOTE: i just took random numbers for the case so im not sure of how to make case:(

case 9437:
if(c.teleEffect == 5)
c.triggerTele(3147+misc.random(2), 3498+misc.random(2), 0);
break;
case 9145:
if(c.teleEffect == 5)
c.triggerTele(3547+misc.random(2), 3498+misc.random(2), 0);
break;
case 9757:
if(c.teleEffect == 5)
c.triggerTele(3576+misc.random(2), 3498+misc.random(2), 0);
break;

plz any cany1 help me out i really need this plz!

1 more question how do i make it so when new players logs in they have 99 slayer?
